mapper.sql: id, create_date, modify_date, address, amount, balance, birth, email, gender, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_failure_count, mobile, name, password, phone, point, register_ip, username, zip_code, area, member_rank, logo, card_id, remarks, is_deleted, type, regtype, credit_code, company, license, iplat, arealnglat, iplng, nation, province, city, district, adcode, hospital, department, open_id, nick_name, wb_id, qq_id, system, source
mapper.select:
select
FROM tf_member where 1 = 1
and username like '%${username}%'
and name like '%${name}%'
and phone like '%${phone}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COALESCE( B.countNum,0) countNum FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-01') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-02') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-03') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year},'-04') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-05') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-06') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-07') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-08') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-09') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-10') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-11') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-12') AS mon ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') createTime, COUNT(id) countNum FROM tf_member GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') ) B ON A.mon = B.createTime order by A.mon
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y') year , COUNT(id) AS countNum FROM tf_member GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y') ORDER BY year DESC

SELECT system,COUNT(id) countNum FROM tf_member where 1 = 1 and system is not null
AND TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_date) <= 1
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1
AND year(create_date)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
and create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
GROUP BY system

SELECT province,COUNT(id) countNum FROM tf_member where 1 = 1
AND TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_date) <= 1
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1
AND year(create_date)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
and create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
GROUP BY province

SELECT source,COUNT(id) countNum FROM tf_member where 1 = 1 and source is not null
AND TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_date) <= 1
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1
AND year(create_date)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
and create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
GROUP BY source

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tf_member WHERE 1 = 1
AND YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(NOW(),#{week,jdbcType=BIGINT})
